summary:
## The Bronze Age: A Time of Change

The Bronze Age was a big deal! It lasted from about 3300 to 1200 BC and saw lots of changes. People started using bronze, a mix of copper and tin, to make super strong tools and weapons. This era also witnessed the birth of writing in places like Mesopotamia and Egypt. Imagine, writing was a brand new invention!

Civilizations got more organized and urban, and trade became important. Some places even experienced a mysterious collapse around 1200 BC, but scholars still debate the reasons why.
title: Bronze Age
